column4: anyone in this channel: I have a  broadcom 4321AG 802.11a/b/g/ draft -n Wifi Adapter, and it doesnt work whatsoever in ubuntu. the wireless on lights doesnt turn on... Anyone who can help me this? Please. this is the only thing obstructing me from installing ubuntu completely.
I believe that is what is in my dell laptop
yes it does work
awesome. how do i make it work?
using the windows drivers via ndiswrapper
awesome. umm, FOB in this kinda stuff, could u explain how i can fix it?
I'll do better.. I'll get you a link
ok
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/Ndiswrapper
that should be a good starting point
if you have questions on ndiswrapper make sure to come back and ask very very specific questions to get help
ty ty ty
u guys r awesomely helpful
I just happened to be passing through :)
had to do the same thing for my dell laptop
:D
i have another prob as well, Sfire/ hewus
the resolution doesnt increase...
Intel video?
nvidia go force 7120
